name: Fountain
description: A clear spring bubbling from the stone.
message: You drink from the fountain. Health +2.

choices.label: Drink deeply
choices.message: The water refreshes you. Health +2.

choices.label: Wash your face
choices.message: You feel a little better. Health +1.

choices.label: Ignore the fountain
choices.message: You pass by the fountain.

name: Wandering Monk
description: A gentle monk who offers blessings.
dialogue: The path is long, but faith is longer.
Rest when you are weary, pilgrim.

choices.label: Ask for a blessing
choices.message: The monk blesses you. Faith +2.

choices.label: Share your troubles
choices.message: You feel lighter. Health +1.

choices.label: Thank and leave
choices.message: You nod and continue on your way.

name: Ancient Oak
description: A massive oak tree, its branches thick with age.
message: You rest beneath the Ancient Oak. Faith +1.

choices.label: Meditate under the tree
choices.message: You feel wisdom in the silence. Faith +2.

choices.label: Collect fallen acorns
choices.message: You gather nourishing acorns. Health +1.

choices.label: Move on quietly
choices.message: You leave the tree undisturbed.

name: Mysterious Owl
description: A silent owl watches you from a branch.
dialogue: Night brings answers to patient souls.

choices.label: Listen to its wisdom
choices.message: The owl's words echo in your mind. Faith +2.

choices.label: Offer some food
choices.message: The owl accepts your gift. Health +1.

choices.label: Walk away
choices.message: The owl blinks slowly as you leave.

name: Wildflower Meadow
description: A clearing filled with vibrant wildflowers.
message: You breathe in the sweet scent. Health +1.

choices.label: Pick a bouquet
choices.message: You feel joy in simple beauty. Faith +1.

choices.label: Lie down and rest
choices.message: You nap among the flowers. Health +2.

choices.label: Continue walking
choices.message: You leave the meadow behind.

name: Gentle Deer
description: A deer grazes quietly, unafraid of your presence.

choices.label: Watch quietly
choices.message: You feel a sense of harmony. Faith +1.

choices.label: Approach slowly
choices.message: The deer lets you come close. Health +1.

choices.label: Scare it away
choices.message: The deer flees into the trees.

name: Poisonous Mushroom
description: A cluster of mushrooms with a strange odor.
message: You accidentally eat a poisonous mushroom. Health -2.

choices.label: Eat one (risky!)
choices.message: You feel sick. Health -2.

choices.label: Examine carefully
choices.message: You recognize the danger and leave them alone.

choices.label: Ignore
choices.message: You walk past the mushrooms.

name: Lost Wolf
description: A hungry wolf eyes you warily.
dialogue: Its eyes are sharp and hungry.

choices.label: Stand your ground
choices.message: The wolf snaps at you. Health -1.

choices.label: Offer food
choices.message: You toss some food. The wolf leaves. Faith +1.

choices.label: Back away slowly
choices.message: You avoid conflict and the wolf disappears.

name: Thorn Bush
description: A dense bush covered in sharp thorns.
message: You brush against the thorns. Health -1.

choices.label: Push through
choices.message: You get scratched badly. Health -2.

choices.label: Go around
choices.message: You take a longer, safer path.

choices.label: Inspect for berries
choices.message: You find edible berries! Health +1.

name: Lake
description: A shallow lake that stretches across several paces.
message: You cool off by the lake.

name: Pond
description: A small, peaceful pond with clear water.
message: You wash your hands in the pond.

name: Stone Circle
description: A circle of standing stones, arranged in an old ritual pattern.
message: You feel the weight of ancient rites.

name: Grove Clearing
description: A broad clearing where light pours through the canopy.
message: You feel the warmth of the clearing.
